title: Race condition on AndroidGraphicsLiveWallpaper
body:
Hey all,
We found a deadlock that happens on Android live wallpapers.
#### Issue details

There was a race condition between the GL thread and the main thread, when resuming wallpapers. It happens in [here](https://github.com/libgdx/libgdx/blob/master/backends/gdx-backend-android/src/com/badlogic/gdx/backends/android/AndroidGraphicsLiveWallpaper.java#L138)

If GL thread is much quicker because of scheduling delays, it might end up drawing its frame before the main thread reaches `resume()`.

This is a problem when you are not drawing on continuous mode, which most people probably do to save some battery.

In that case, `synch.wait()` will just hang because nobody else requested a frame since rendering was set to _on-demand_.
#### Reproduction steps/code

It's kind of tricky to reproduce, since it's a concurrency problem, but can add:

``` java
Thread.sleep(3000);
```

[Before the `synch.wait()` call](https://github.com/libgdx/libgdx/blob/master/backends/gdx-backend-android/src/com/badlogic/gdx/backends/android/AndroidGraphicsLiveWallpaper.java#L138)
#### Version of LibGDX and/or relevant dependencies

Latest on `master`.
#### Stacktrace

``` java
"main" prio=5 tid=1 Waiting
  | group="main" sCount=1 dsCount=0 obj=0x74b2ff58 self=0x7ee2c95a00
  | sysTid=29955 nice=0 cgrp=default sched=0/0 handle=0x7ee6c21a98
  | state=S schedstat=( 146166665 78867030 518 ) utm=9 stm=4 core=1 HZ=100
```

#### Please select the affected platforms
- [X] Android
- [ ] iOS (robovm)
- [ ] iOS (MOE)
- [ ] HTML/GWT
- [ ] Windows
- [ ] Linux
- [ ] MacOS
### Proposed fix

``` diff
diff --git a/backends/gdx-backend-android/src/com/badlogic/gdx/backends/android/AndroidGraphicsLiveWallpaper.java b/backends/gdx-backend-android/src/com/badlogic/gdx/backends/android/AndroidGraphicsLiveWallpaper.java
index 5fcd0e4..0cb0368 100644
--- a/backends/gdx-backend-android/src/com/badlogic/gdx/backends/android/AndroidGraphicsLiveWallpaper.java
+++ b/backends/gdx-backend-android/src/com/badlogic/gdx/backends/android/AndroidGraphicsLiveWallpaper.java
@@ -136,6 +136,7 @@
            // by jw: added synchronization, there was nothing before
            while (resume) {
                try {
+                   requestRendering();
                    synch.wait();
                } catch (InterruptedException ignored) {
                    Gdx.app.log("AndroidGraphics", "waiting for resume synchronization failed!");
```
